mapper.select: SELECT user_id ,create_at ,modify_at ,name ,password ,status ,nickname ,student_number ,phone_number ,email ,birthday FROM user WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (create_at, modify_at, name, password, status, nickname, student_number, phone_number, email, birthday) value (#{createdDate}, #{modifiedDate}, #{name}, #{password}, #{status}, #{nickname}, #{studentNum}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{birthday})
